ErrorIndex.title: Wrapper for index information inside an error.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for REST APIs

code.description: the numeric HTTP error code for the response.

details.description: The optional details of the error response.

dictionary.description:
Dictionary/map of associated data/information relevant to the error.
The error "message" may contain {{name}} escapes that should be substituted
with information from this dictionary.

errors.description:
Collection of errors in cases where more than one exists. This needs to be
flexible so we can support multiple formats

internal.description: Internal error code in cases where we don't have an array of errors

message.description: The basic text error message for the error response.

ref.description: Reference to the error source. Should typically be the URI of the request

type.description:
URI pointing at a document that describes the error and mitigation steps
If there is no document, point to the RFC for the HTTP error code

Status.title: Status is a return value for calls that don't return other objects.

com.nokia.eda.system.v1alpha1.Monitor.description: Monitor is the Schema for the monitors API

spec.description: MonitorSpec defines the desired state of Monitor

cpu.description: CPU monitoring for targets matching this Monitor.

utilization.description: Parameters relating to CPU utilization monitoring.

criticalThreshold.description:
The minimum average utilization over the last 1 minute to trigger a critical alarm.
This value must be greater than the majorThreshold.
criticalThreshold.title: Critical Threshold

fallingDelta.description:
The delta in which a triggered threshold must drop below to clear an alarm.
For example, with a criticalThreshold of 90 and a fallingDelta of 5, the critical alarm will clear when the utilization drops below 85.
fallingDelta.title: Falling Delta

majorThreshold.description:
The minimum average utilization over the last 1 minute to trigger a major alarm.
This value must be greater than the minorThreshold.
majorThreshold.title: Major Threshold

minorThreshold.description: The minimum average utilization over the last 1 minute to trigger a minor alarm.
minorThreshold.title: Minor Threshold

utilization.title: Thresholds

cpu.title: CPU

nodeSelector.description: Selector to use when including TopoNodes to monitor.
nodeSelector.title: Node Selector

spec.title: Specification

ui-conditions.condition: (spec.nodeSelector !== undefined && Array.isArray(spec.nodeSelector) && spec.nodeSelector.length > 0) || (spec.nodes !== undefined && Array.isArray(spec.nodes) && spec.nodes.length > 0)
ui-conditions.errorMsg: Node or Node Selector must be populated

Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.
